title: Two kittens
content: Not sure if I've told, but our cat died about half a year ago. We got today two new kittens. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] They're fun, although it's not easy to forget the previous pet who was here 19 years.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Kittay.
content:
Funky. Kittens rock.

One of my cats vanished a couple of weeks ago, so I'm left now with Tilde, the more tame and homely of the two. While it's always sad to lose a pet, I must admit it's alot easier only looking after one cat.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

"You are so afraid to live--so afraid of life itself--that you've given up the very nature of your being in trade for security."
-CWG Book 3, Neale Donald Walsh

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Kittay.
content:
Can't take pics.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img]

"One of my cats vanished a couple of weeks ago, so I'm left now with Tilde, the more tame and homely of the two. While it's always sad to lose a pet, I must admit it's alot easier only looking after one cat."
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] Hopefully it'll come back.

It's good that the kittens have behaved quite nicely..You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Two kittens
content:
Though I don't much like cats myself, it's great you have two you like, KeenRush; I hope they turn out to be good and helpful (un-spoiled) [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

BTW, you must have known that 19-year old cat all your life!If the universe were toast, what jelly would you put on it?

title: Re: Two kittens
content:
^ Yeah, of course.
It was pretty sad when I realized that the cat isn't here tonight, but was here yesterday and all my life before that. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!
